name: torrra
tagline: A unified torrent search and management interface
description: Torrra is a self-hosted torrent management application that centralizes torrent searching, adding, and monitoring across multiple clients using a unified web interface.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search for torrents across multiple indexers and trackers without visiting each site

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View all active torrents from different clients in one consolidated view

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Control torrent clients running on different machines from a central web interface

features.title: Download Monitoring
features.description: Track download progress, speeds, and completion status across all clients

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Add torrents to any connected client by URL, magnet link, or file upload
